title: Head of Pakistani physiciansâ€™ body in UK meets prime minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 29 (APP): Chairman of the Association of Pakistani Physicians and Surgeons (APPS) in the United Kingdom Dr Usman Khan Monday called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here.
During the meeting, Dr Usman appreciated the prime minister for taking steps for the betterment of the overseas Pakistanis.
The meeting also discussed the measures to uplift the health and nursing fields, and ways to attract the investment of overseas Pakistani doctors in the sector.
Special Assistant to Prime Minister Dr Faisal Sultan also attended the meeting.
